data.name: Introduction to Ruins of the Grendleroot

entries: Ruins of the Grendleroot is a collection of adventures set in the deep halls of Blackclaw Mountain, tied together by strange remnants of an ancient world.
Deepdelver’s Enclave is a bastion of civilization inside Blackclaw Mountain, serving as the home base for adventurers venturing into the ruins.
Blackclaw Mountain was shaped by ancient cosmic events, leaving behind ruins and artifacts of vast mystery and power.
Tales tell of the Black Star falling, shattering the mountain and twisting its halls forever.
The songs of the Starsong Tower once guided lost travelers, but now they call only to the brave... or the doomed.

entries.name: Notable NPCs
entries: Elder Mystriel: The keeper of Starsong Tower’s fading magic.
Varna Blackshield: Bandit leader seeking the tower's power.

entries.name: Secrets and Clues
entries: The Starsong Tower's magic is tied to an ancient celestial artifact.
Bandits have been drawn to the tower by dreams sent by the Grendleroot.

Beneath the mountain's roots, forgotten prayers echo in silent halls, awaiting ears foolish enough to listen.

entries.name: Notable NPCs
entries: Priestess Hallowed Veyne: Twisted acolyte of a dead god.

entries.name: Secrets and Clues
entries: The Forgotten God was abandoned after a catastrophic betrayal by its followers.
Ancient relics still pulse with divine power deep below the temple.

This section provides tips for improvising within Blackclaw Mountain, using random tables, and tuning encounters based on party strength.
A cosmic horror stirs once more beneath Blackclaw Mountain, awakening ancient engines of destruction.
